task_description: In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe for 'Broccoli Salad' with the following details: Category 'Salad', Description 'A healthy and delicious salad', Source 'Grandma's recipe book', Servings '4', Time '20 minutes', Ingredients 'Broccoli, mayonnaise, raisins, walnuts', Directions 'Mix all ingredients together and chill before serving'. Save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Dish' and the description 'A delicious and easy-to-make recipe'. Add an image to the recipe and save it.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with a title, category, description, source, servings, time, ingredients, and directions, then save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Task-Oriented: Create a new recipe by adding a title, selecting a category, and adding a description, then save the recipe.

In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Soup', category 'Soup', description 'A delicious and hearty soup', source 'My Grandma', servings '4', time '60 minutes', ingredients 'Vegetables, broth, noodles', and directions 'Combine all ingredients and simmer for 60 minutes. Save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Close the bottom panel and then share the app with friends.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe, but first acknowledge that no categories have been created by clicking 'OK' in the dialog box.
In app broccoli app, Return to the main recipe list after deciding not to create a new recipe.
In app broccoli app, Navigate to the 'Recipes' section of the Broccoli app to browse available recipes.
In app broccoli app, Task-Oriented: Share the Broccoli app with a friend using the 'Messages' app.

In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe by picking a photo from the gallery, naming the recipe 'My Special Dish', selecting the 'Main Course' category, and adding a brief description: 'A delicious and easy-to-make dish for any occasion.'

In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe by picking a photo from the gallery, naming the recipe 'Delicious Broccoli', selecting the category 'Vegetarian', adding a description 'A simple and healthy broccoli recipe', specifying the source as 'Grandma's recipe book', setting the servings to '2', the time to '30 minutes', adding ingredients 'Broccoli, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper', and adding directions 'Steam broccoli, saute garlic in olive oil, combine and season'.
In app broccoli app, Task-Oriented: Cancel the creation of a new recipe and return to the main 'Recipes' screen.
In app broccoli app, Navigate to the 'Categories' section to view the available recipe categories.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Soup', a description of 'A hearty and delicious soup for cold days', and a photo of the soup. Save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Soup', a description of 'A hearty and delicious soup for cold days', and save it, even though no categories are available.
In app broccoli app, Return to the main screen and create a new recipe named 'Pasta' with a description of 'Italian Dish'.
In app broccoli app, Search for a recipe named 'Pasta' in the app.
In app broccoli app, Task-Oriented: Change the recipe photo by picking a photo from the gallery.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Soup', select the 'Soup' category, add the description 'A hearty and delicious soup for cold days', and save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with a title, description, and image, but note that no categories are available to assign to the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Change the 'Theme' from 'System default' to 'Dark'.

In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe with the title 'My Special Soup', category 'Soup', description 'A hearty and delicious soup', source 'Grandma', servings '4', time '30 minutes', ingredients 'Vegetables, broth, noodles', and directions 'Combine all ingredients and simmer for 30 minutes. Save the recipe.

In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe by adding a title, selecting a category, adding a description, specifying the source, number of servings, preparation time, ingredients, and directions, then save the recipe.
In app broccoli app, Share the Broccoli app with a friend using the 'Messages' app.
In app broccoli app, Share the Broccoli app with a friend by clicking 'Support the app' and then clicking 'SHARE THE APP'.
In app broccoli app, Task-Oriented: Add a photo to the new recipe by picking a photo from the gallery.
